title: Real Madrid firing Alonso would be easy. Replacing him? Much harder - ESPN
snippet: Alonso has been learning this in-post, and it has been brutal. The evidence is there: Rafa Benítez and Julen Lopetegui are two coaches renowned for their interventionist, infinite-detail, micromanaging tactical approach.

title: List of Real Madrid CF managers - Wikipedia
snippet: The most successful coach with Real Madrid is Carlo Ancelotti, as won 15 titles with the team.

title: Xabi Alonso Discovering Real Madrid Is the Impossible Job for All But Two People
snippet: In their most recent spells in charge, Zidane oversaw 114 games and Ancelotti 234. That hints at patience. Between Zidane’s two stretches, Julen Lopetegui lasted 14 games and Santiago Solari 32.

title: Next Real Madrid manager: Jurgen Klopp, Zinedine Zidane & the seven candidates to replace doomed Xabi Alonso after Man City humbling | Goal.com India
snippet: The Yellow Submarine have really struggled in Europe's elite competition, which would be a concern for Madrid if they do seriously consider Marcelino, but only Alonso, Hansi Flick, Diego Simeone and Manuel Pellegrini have stronger CVs among ...
